title: Universalisation of the Mine Ban in Asia
description: The investment will enable Geneva Call to engage and monitor 25 non state actors from Asia to sign and adhere to the Deed of Commitment for the Adherence to a total ban on Anti-Personnel Mines and for Cooepration in Mine Action. Geneva Call will prioritise activities in countries where non state actors continue to use anti-personnel mines. Geneva Call will aim to increase adherenece by non state actors to the anti-personnel mine ban norm.
